thread.title: Arsenal transfer news: Alexis Sanchez wanted by AC Milan | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal transfer news: Alexis Sanchez wanted by AC Milan | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal transfer news: Alexis Sanchez wanted by AC Milan | Metro News
text:
Arsenal’s Alexis Sanchez among big-name AC Milan transfer targets gossip Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 22 Feb 2017 7:27 am Alexis Sanchez is reportedly wanted by AC Milan (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal forward Alexis Sanchez is reportedly among a number of big names on AC Milan’s hit-list for the summer transfer window as they get around £110million to spend on new signings. Rumour Mill: our round-up of football gossip, rumours and speculation 
The Italian giants are looking to rebuild after a disappointing few years, with a takeover by a wealthy Chinese consortium expected to be completed in the near future. 
Sanchez’s Arsenal future is in doubt at the moment as he seemingly stalls on signing a new contract, and it may be that the Gunners will be forced to consider offers for him in the summer. Sanchez is Arsenal’s top scorer this season (Picture: Getty) 
The Chile international has been one of the best players in the Premier League since he joined Arsenal from Barcelona in 2014, but the club look to be facing a fight to keep hold of him.
